body:
Hey everyone, 

Just a PSA, there is going to be one hell of a Zoom party tonight at around 11-12ish EST. Voice chat will be over Teamspeak, video will be over Zoom. It'll be awesome (it always is). Hope to see some people there! 

See yah soon,
Max

P.S. Bring alcohol

title: Zoom Party Tonight (Basically Tinychat)
